snippet: The subscription flower delivery service, aiming for ambitious growth, created a six-month leadership program to nurture young talent. It's called SEED, for Start-up Education and Entrepreneurial Development.
abstract: The subscription flower delivery service, aiming for ambitious growth, created a six-month leadership program to nurture young talent. It's called SEED, for Start-up Education and Entrepreneurial Development.

headline.main: Why H.Bloom Hires Only From Outside Its Industry
